name: @InoReader: Colorful Feeds (2014)
description: Applies pseudo-not-really-random background colors to feed items in Inoreader RSS reader. The 'randomness' is simply based on the last digit of the subscription id. Some additional fixes and styling included in separate sections. Updated version of the older userstyle, @InoReader: Colorful Feeds. Should now be compatible with various inoreader article-density display settings.
additional_info: versions: 1.00: release (2014-09-19). 1.01: (2014-09-19) Switched to using feed ID instead of subscription ID since [suid] isn't available in some other sections. Also removed and substituted :-moz-any pseudo-classes for compatibility. changed article visitation indicator from border-color to color (style the character/icon instead). 1.02: minor fix to .arrow-div nodes so they aren't grey when hovered. 1.03: minor fixes; hide ads. (2015-03-25) 1.04: patch to hide ad sidebar. (2016-03-23)
